.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_DESCRIPTOR_POOL_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkDescriptorPoolCreateFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo-pPoolSizes-parameter]] pname:pPoolSizes must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:poolSizeCount valid sname:VkDescriptorPoolSize structures
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo-poolSizeCount-arraylength]] pname:poolSizeCount must: be greater than `0`
****
